robot
Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  robot.Robot

public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object

Robot.java Models an autonomous robot. This class is the center of the architecture. It defines all of the robots abilities.

Author:
Matthew Vertescher

retrieveBall

public void retrieveBall(int n)
Retrieve ball. This is accomplished by moving onto the gridline, then backing into the ball dispenser. The robot returns to its original point when done.

Parameters:
n - number of balls to retrieve
